section.heading: Exempt organizations — Political organizations.
section.text: The income of every political organization subject to tax under section 527 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 [26 U.S.C. § 527 ] shall be taxed in the same manner and to the same extent as income of a corporation is taxed under subchapter VII of this Chapter.

annotations.annotation: Section 527 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, referred to this section, is classified to 26 U.S.C. § 527.
